TopicTitle: How to rearrange icons in the stock toolbar?

Articles.Content:
Hi there. I have a couple of mods. Enough for scroll buttons to appear on my toolbar.
Apparently some icons I use most of the times are in the very bottom of it. And I wish I can rearrange them, so I don't need to scroll all the time.
Is there a way or mod how to reorder these icons?

I would be happy even if there's a way to change smth in the config files to fix it. And I can see the order is consistent, so there is some determined criteria it uses. I looked into save files, but got nothing related.

Thanks!
